document_data.name: Saurovin Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Saurovin Street''' was one of the main thoroughfares in [[Daerlun]], [[Sembia]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]]. This street ran east-southeast from the southern tip of the [[Westmarket]] area until it ended at [[Barrel Lane]] near the southern gate out of the city, known as the Sea Arch. Among the residences and shops on Saurovin Street was [[Shadowdark House]], an oddity that could roughly be called a magic shop.{{Cite dragon/287/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Shadowdark House|70}}
